Name: FarmingCat
About the game: You're a cat in a world of islands. You can explore, craft, build, destroy, collect drops Don't worry about monsters, no one will attack you. But you have to care about food, stamina and economy! The game will have an update every Monday. GAMEPLAY Build and destroy whatever you want! The world is yours. Cultivate vegetables Find the best place to create a big and productive farm. Create your cute home Go mine to discover minerals and go deep to find rare ore. Care about stamina and food, taking with you some food it's not a bad idea. Your inventory has a small capacity, decide with awareness what to take in your travels. If you have an advice, please tell me. You can write me directly on my socials
